Headline: 63rd-bound Green & Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green & Midway-bound Orange Line trains running w/residual delays following earlier track condition at Roosevelt. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green & Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier track condition near Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Northbound Reroute near Broadway/Grace
ShortDescription: NB 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Addison, Halsted & Broadway, due to police department activity near Broadway/Grace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Addison, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Broadway, due to police department activity near Broadway/Grace.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont,  due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
